fi.tamk.cgeng.objects

Class CollisionSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.cgeng.objects.CollisionSystem

  • public class CollisionSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Automatic collision system for GameObjects, when set to gameObject, it automatically detects collision between GameObject and tileMap and prevents GameObject from moving to solid tiles

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CollisionSystem.NoMapFoundException
      RuntimeException that is thrown if for some reason CollisionSystem can't find gameObjects TileMap

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollisionSystem(GameObject gameObject)
      Constructor that initializes gameObject, creates collision points, and put them on right CollisionPoints lists.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkCollision(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> collList, int x, int y)
      Checks if given list of CollidePoints collides with gameObject's tileMap contents. parameters x and y is to check collision in coordinate relative to Points coordinates.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getDownCollPoints()
      Returns list of downCollPoints
      java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getLeftCollPoints()
      Returns list of downCollPoints
      java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getRightCollPoints()
      Returns list of rightCollPoints
      java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getUpCollPoints()
      Returns list of upCollPoints
      void updatePoints()
      updates position of all collision points.

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> collList,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        Checks if given list of CollidePoints collides with gameObject's tileMap contents. parameters x and y is to check collision in coordinate relative to Points coordinates.
        Parameters:
        collList - List of collision Points
        x - coordinate x relative to Points coordinate x
        y - coordinate y relative to Points coordinate y
